title: Wooden1337

content: Hey! I have $25 + $20 amazon.COM giftcards and looking for 70-75% BTC/LTC/ETH. If you are interested, just comment below or DM me your offer

comments.body: i can offer 70% of face value of amazon cards , can take any amount you got.
